title: Derygull Templeton

properties.name: description
properties.value: Derygull Templeton was one of the seven priestly warriors who died fighting the Morytanian hordes at Silvarea. He came from Falador.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Derygull Templeton

Derygull Templeton was one of the seven priestly warriors who died fighting the Morytanian hordes at Silvarea. He came from Falador.

He is described in the Ancient tome as "A great oak of a man, so well imbued with Saradomin's will and martial ability that he fair commanded people's respect and admiration and they eagerly followed him into battle. His booming voice rallied man in times of fierce fighting, this allowing them to regroup and focus their brutal, savage violence and force capitulation from writhing, cowardly, evil hordes."

v • d • e

rawContent:
{{external|rs}}
'''Derygull Templeton''' was one of the [[Seven Priestly Warriors|seven priestly warriors]] who died fighting the [[Morytania]]n hordes at [[Silvarea]]. He came from [[Falador]].

He is described in the [[Ancient tome]] as "A great oak of a man, so well imbued with [[Saradomin]]'s will and martial ability that he fair commanded people's respect and admiration and they eagerly followed him into battle. His booming voice rallied man in times of fierce fighting, this allowing them to regroup and focus their brutal, savage violence and force capitulation from writhing, cowardly, evil hordes."

{{Seven Priestly Warriors}}
